actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 901(a) (relating to prohibition of sex discrimination) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt sex segregated gymnastics classes from the prohibition of such section.

summary.text: Amends the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt sex segregated gymnastics classes from the prohibition against sex discrimination contained within such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 901(a) (relating to prohibition of sex discrimination) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt sex segregated gymnastics classes from the prohibition of such section.
